Focus on creating a professional, intuitive design that facilitates ease of use for end users and reflects the look and feel of a large-scale enterprise system. Reference established UI/UX guidelines such as the Microsoft Fluent Design System and IBM Carbon Design System to inform design choices.remember our framework is a browser fingerprinting tool aimed at enterprise users, so the UI/UX should reflect professionalism, clarity, and usability suitable for that audience. pure js css html.
